days.name: Jason's obsession OR Meda's worst nightmare
days.text: To start of the best time of the year, I thought I'd make you something you like. I'll never forget your happy face, when you had it.

days.name: Jason meets the Polish store OR No pressure, gurlfren - meet my dad
days.text: As you know, I am not a relationship expert, BUT I've noticed that people don't make they SOs meeting their paternals only weeks in their relationship. But you know what? WE're not normal and screw the expectations. Even though I was having invisible scared-poos in my belly, I really enjoyed meeting your dad and Debbie. And now, go open your present, which hopefully will remind you of the ending of the day, when you met Mr. Polish store.

days.name: His obsession with sweets OR don't trust a person who doesn't like chocolate
Remember our first date? OR Am I the reason you drink?
days.text: I thought today would be a great day to remember our start to alcoholism, which we should probably control a bit haha. Who would have known that a boy, who takes shirtless selfies, is going to turn out to be a beautiful human being? Anywho, I remember that it wass very hot that day and I was hoping we're not going to hug, at least right away, just because I was sweating sooooo much! I don't remember much from the day, just because I was nervous and I could tell you were too. I only got one picture that day, which was one of the beers I tried. Also, you took my cheese curds virginity that day haha.

days.name: To Jason, for dealing with my blackout and still being with me -- (rename)
days.text: This will always be remembered as our first concert, where I met your friends, your mom, and Mr. Blackout. I can't believe you did not ghost my butt right after.

days.name: To the days we did nothing and it was great
Jason’s obsession w/ Macca or Meda meets America
days.text: I have told you that I've been to Macca's more times in the past few months than in my whole lifetime.

days.name: For the love of BB or Let’s cook some quesadillas
days.text: The road to my heart is through my stomach for sure. I think you already had figured that out after you gifted me some hot sauce and hot cheetos! But the time you made me quesadillas, I decided that this guy is a keeper. This is the right Jason after all off other Jasons out there AND I'm going to kick every Chicken Wing Felicia's butt in the way.

days.name: Let's call this a cabin OR [rename]
random ---think of the story to put here
I like hot sauce, yes I do OR I like you more
red ketchup or Pressure me much
after work walk hot sauce date, first selfie, rain
I fly out but you're on my mind -- [fixed, rename] (flight day)
All I want for Christmas is YOU
